Job Description: What you'll do:     Design and development of new features on BTS/nodeB/eNodbe      writing system and design specification and unit test plan      Taking the ownership of the feature and work with cross functional teams to successful delivery of the feature      Understanding of end to end scenario and troubleshooting/fixing of field and QA reported issues     What you must have:     Minimum 06-10 years experience in 1 RAT development      Protocol development experience in GSM/GPRS/WCDMA/HSPA/LTE/LTE advance      strong hold on C, C++, SW architecture      Good understanding of best practice software engineering processes, version control, testing and release cycles      Strong communication skills      Excellent understanding of 3GPP standards      Solid understanding of Linux OS internals, TCP/IP, multi-threading      Excellent verbal and written communication skills are required      Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills
Functional Area: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design,
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial, Any Graduate in Any Specialization
PG: Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization, M.Tech in Electronics/Telecommunication
